text: Yeh jhoot sunne waley aur haram ke maal khane waley hain, lihaza agar yeh tumhare paas (apne muqaddamaat lekar) aayein to tumhein ikhtiyar diya jata hai ke chaho inka faisla karo warna inkar kardo. Inkar kardo to yeh tumhara kuch bigaad nahin sakte, aur faisla karo to phir theek theek insaf ke saath karo ke Allah insaf karne walon ko pasand karta hai
